DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether add Raltegravir fully suppressive antiretroviral regimen assist reduce HIV-1 associated chronic inflammation increase t-lymphocyte memory cell pool .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Downregulation HIV-1 When Raltegravir Added Virologically Suppressed HAART Regimen
DOC.criteria: 1 . At least 18 year age 2 . HIVpositive Western blot viral load 3 . Viral load < 400 copies/ml 4 . CD4+ Tlymphocyte count le 350 cells/mm3 change CD4+ Tlymphocyte count < 100 cells/mm3 least one year stable HAART viral load < 400 copies/ml period time 1 . CD4+ Tlymphocyte count great equal 350 cells/mm3 rise CD4+ Tlymphocyte count great equal 100 cells/mm3 within one year study entry 2 . Viral load > 400 copies/ml 3 . Allergy resistance raltegravir
